Deprecated API

  • Methods
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.apache.juneau.rest.client.ResponseContent.consumeContent()
    Use standard java convention to ensure resource deallocation by calling InputStream.close() on the input stream returned by ResponseContent.getContent()
    org.apache.juneau.rest.client.RestClient.getConnectionManager()
    Use HttpClientBuilder.
    org.apache.juneau.rest.client.RestClient.getParams()
    Use RequestConfig.
    org.apache.juneau.rest.client.RestRequest.completed()
    org.apache.juneau.rest.client.RestRequest.getParams()
    Use constructor parameters of configuration API provided by HttpClient.
    org.apache.juneau.rest.client.RestRequest.setParams(HttpParams)
    Use constructor parameters of configuration API provided by HttpClient.
    org.apache.juneau.rest.client.RestResponse.getParams()
    Use configuration classes provided org.apache.http.config and org.apache.http.client.config.
    org.apache.juneau.rest.client.RestResponse.setParams(HttpParams)
    Use configuration classes provided org.apache.http.config and org.apache.http.client.config.
